titles.title: Expressing the strong support of the House of Representatives for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization to enter into a Membership Action Plan with Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/13/2008--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should take the lead in supporting the awarding of a North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Membership Action Plan to Ukraine.
